altername_name: Imagina Ser: Profesora: Campamento de Verano
name: Imagine: Teacher: Class Trip
overview: Imagine Teacher: Class Trip gives you the chance to lead a classroom full of students, this time taking them out to explore the thrilling outdoors on an exciting field trip! Features • Proven Classroom Gameplay - - Create and teach morning lessons in a variety of subjects, including Math, Science and Nature, and Geography - Grade your students’ work and keep them attentive during class. • Break Out of the Classroom - - Take your class on an exciting outdoor treasure hunt – Search for clues and souvenirs to be the first class to complete the hunt! - Encourage teamwork and bonding to boost your scores. - Discover and foil traps set up by other competitors. • Explore – Identify and collect rare plants on your outing and enjoy a variety of fun mini-games set outside from the forest to the lake shore!
